mapper.select: SELECT od.odID, o.mID, p.pNAME, od.odSIZE, od.odQTY FROM ORDERS_DETAIL od, ORDERS o, PRODUCT p WHERE od.oID = o.oID AND od.pID = p.pID ORDER BY od.odID DESC
